summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 28
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Tuesday, with 12 gaining and the other seven declining.
Bitcoin fell 0.6% to $23,215 by market close.
